statements: SELECT customer_id, total_points, total_purchases, last_purchase_date FROM loyalty_program_rewards;
SELECT total_points, customer_id, last_purchase_date, total_purchases FROM loyalty_program_rewards;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchases FROM loyalty_program_rewards WHERE total_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_rewards WHERE last_purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT total_points AS points, total_purchases AS purchases FROM loyalty_program_rewards WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, total_points, last_purchase_date, total_purchases FROM loyalty_program_rewards;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_rewards WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchases, total_points FROM loyalty_program_rewards WHERE last_purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT total_purchases, SUM(total_points) AS total_points_sum FROM loyalty_program_rewards GROUP BY total_purchases HAVING total_purchases > 5;
SELECT customer_id, total_points, last_purchase_date FROM loyalty_program_rewards ORDER BY last_purchase_date ASC, total_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 500;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 50;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers, SUM(loyalty_points) AS total_loyalty_points FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, reward_points FROM rewards WHERE reward_points < 500 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, total_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_points > 100 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_points, reward_points FROM loyalty_program JOIN rewards ON loyalty_program.customer_id = rewards.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM loyalty_program JOIN purchases ON loyalty_program.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, total_points, purchase_date FROM loyalty_program JOIN purchases ON loyalty_program.customer_id = purchases.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, total_points, reward_date FROM loyalty_program JOIN rewards ON loyalty_program.customer_id = rewards.customer_id WHERE reward_points > 50 ORDER BY reward_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, total_points FROM customers ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, amount FROM purchases WHERE amount > 100;

SELECT customer_name, reward_name, required_points FROM customers JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id JOIN rewards ON customer_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id;
SELECT customer_name, total_points FROM customers WHERE total_points < 500 ORDER BY total_points ASC;
SELECT customer_name, total_points FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_points FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount_spent FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customer_name, reward_name, required_points FROM customers JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id JOIN rewards ON customer_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id;

SELECT customers.customer_name, SUM(rewards.required_points) AS total_points_required FROM customers JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id JOIN rewards ON customer_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name HAVING total_points_required > 5000;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, last_login, total_engagement_minutes FROM customer_engagement WHERE total_engagement_minutes < 60;
SELECT reward_name, loyalty_points_required FROM rewards WHERE loyalty_points_required BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT reward_name, loyalty_points_required FROM rewards ORDER BY loyalty_points_required DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchase_amount > 500;
SELECT c.customer_id, r.reward_name, rh.redemption_date FROM customer_engagement c JOIN redemption_history rh ON c.customer_id = rh.customer_id JOIN rewards r ON rh.reward_id = r.reward_id;
